title: Feeding Lamb
description: Brendan saved Andy's life when they were children, but this heroic act caused him to get epilepsy. 10 years later, Brendan is still stuck in the role of a victim and with Andy as his only friend, who's been the one taking care of him all this time, letting him indulge in his drinking problem and satisfying his sexual needs... What will become of them when Andy's dirty secrets come out into the open?
